name: Pawn Shops
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that lend money in exchange for personal property left
with the merchants as security. Pawn shops may, upon default of the
loan, sell the property to the general public. Property left as security
may include items such as jewelry, watches, musical instruments,
bicycles, furniture, coins, and camera and photographic equipment.
